item.title: First Entry in my new Gemini Log
item.description: The first entry of my Gemini Log (Gemlog) is up: 2023-03-17 - Hello, Universe! I am thinking that my Gemini Capsule should be a place for me to share my writing, my writerâ€™s journal, and my musings about writing.

item.title: Local Gemini Server - Quick and Dirty
item.description: If you, like me, are excited about Project Gemini and want to create your own capsule (Gemini site), you will probably wonder how you would test your capsule on your local machine before putting it out there.

item.title: Welcome to my new blog
item.description: My old blog at WordPress only has one single post in it. I wrote it using Org-mode in Emacs, and used an extension to put it on WordPress. That was good.
